name: Witch College
description:
Witch College is a charming and magical story about a young man who must ask a girl to a Halloween Dance. When a new girl comes to the school, weird things start happening and he suspects she may be an ancient legendary witch who is trying to seduce him.

  • Different endings depending on your choices.
  • Charming and unique characters.
  • More than 20 beautiful scenes.
  • Erotic content.
  • Non linear story.
